00010 {
00011 
00012   double dtol=10*sqrt(numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
00013   vector<double> xyVals(2);
00014   xyVals[0]=-106.482;
00015   xyVals[1]=35.0913;
00016   cout << " Creating a point using values x=1,y=2 " << endl;
00017 
00018   vector<string> projArgs;
00019   projArgs.push_back("proj=latlong");
00020   projArgs.push_back("datum=WGS84");
00021   cout << " pushed projArgs into vector " << endl;
00022 
00023   try
00024   {
00025     DFLib::Proj::Point myFirstPoint(xyVals,projArgs);
00026 
00027     cout << " Point created. " << endl;
00028 
00029     vector<double> xyStored = myFirstPoint.getUserCoords();
00030 
00031     cout << " Retrieved XY from stored point.  Lon = " << xyStored[0]
00032          << " Lat = " << xyStored[1];
00033 
00034     if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00035       cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00036     else
00037       cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00038 
00039     xyVals = myFirstPoint.getXY();
00040     xyVals[0] += 200;
00041     xyVals[1] += 200;
00042     cout << " Resetting XY in stored point to X=" << xyVals[0]  << ",Y= "
00043          << xyVals[1] << endl;
00044     myFirstPoint.setXY(xyVals);
00045     xyStored = myFirstPoint.getXY();
00046 
00047     cout << " Retrieved XY from stored point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00048          << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00049 
00050     if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00051       cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00052     else
00053     {
00054       cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00055       cout << "       storedX=" << xyStored[0] << " Should be " << xyVals[0]
00056            << endl;
00057       cout << "       storedY=" << xyStored[1] << " Should be " << xyVals[1]
00058            << endl;
00059     }
00060 
00061     xyStored = myFirstPoint.getUserCoords();
00062     cout << " Lat Lon values of stored, modified point are " 
00063          << " Lon=" << xyStored[0]
00064          << " Lat=" << xyStored[1] << endl;
00065 
00066     cout << " Cloning point. " << endl;
00067     DFLib::Proj::Point *mySecondPointPtr = myFirstPoint.Clone();
00068     xyStored = mySecondPointPtr->getXY();
00069 
00070     cout << " Retrieved XY from cloned point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00071          << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00072 
00073     if (fabs(xyStored[0]-xyVals[0])< dtol && fabs(xyStored[1]-xyVals[1])<dtol)
00074       cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00075     else
00076     {
00077       cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00078       cout << "       storedX=" << xyStored[0] << " Should be " << xyVals[0]
00079            << " difference " << xyStored[0]-xyVals[0] << endl;
00080       cout << "       storedY=" << xyStored[1] << " Should be " << xyVals[1]
00081            << " difference " << xyStored[1]-xyVals[1] << endl;
00082       cout << "       Tolerance is " << dtol << endl;
00083         
00084     }
00085         
00086     cout << " Resetting XY in cloned point to X=0,Y=1 " << endl;
00087     xyVals[0]=0;
00088     xyVals[1]=1;
00089     mySecondPointPtr->setXY(xyVals);
00090     xyStored = mySecondPointPtr->getXY();
00091 
00092     cout << " Retrieved XY from cloned point.  X = " << xyStored[0]
00093          << " Y = " << xyStored[1];
00094 
00095     if (xyStored[0] == xyVals[0] && xyStored[1] == xyVals[1])
00096       cout << " PASSED " << endl;
00097     else
00098       cout << " FAILED " << endl;
00099 
00100     xyStored = mySecondPointPtr->getUserCoords();
00101     cout << " Retrieved LL from modified, cloned point.  Lon = " << xyStored[0]
00102          << " Lat = " << xyStored[1] << endl;
